name: David H. Parramon
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Senior Frontend/Full-stack engineer with 10+ years building React/Next.js applications, complex UI systems, and scalable SaaS products. Experience across USA and EU markets. Expertise in performance optimization, design systems, modern FE architectures, and product-focused development.

Integrated AI image recognition and LLM-based content generation.
Migrated analytics to GA4 and built event-based tracking pipelines.

Improved performance and accessibility across multiple sites.
Redesigned checkout modules increasing transaction completion.
